modName: Sir Bronn of the Fookin Blackwater Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: Ok, it's time.. Ser Bronn is waiting for you in Solitude! the best companion and bodyguard ever seen, is ready to join you in the fight! enjoy!!!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][color=#5B0F00][size=6][color=#783F04]Sir Bronn Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/color]
[/size][/color][size=3]
[size=4]NOT Just another Character from [/size]
                 HBO's [size=5]GAME OF THRONES..
[size=6]  THIS IS BRONN!!![/size]

[color=#a4c2f4](i hope you enjoy)[/color][/size][/size][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][size=3]
[size=4]Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Errant Longsword (Bronn Sword).
Location : The Winking Skeever (Solitude)
Combat Style : meele warrior
..and is unkillable[/size][/size][/size][/b]

[color=#00ff00][b][size=5][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=5][b][size=3][size=4][size=3][Credits]
[size=2][size=3]
